spell.name: Divinity
spell.description: When you heal with a Holy Word spell, your healing is increased by 15% for 6 sec.

spell.name: Surge of Light
spell.description: Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Maximum 2 charges.

spec.name: Holy
spec.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

spell.name: Apotheosis
spell.description: Enter a pure Holy form for 30 sec, increasing the effects of Serendipity by 200% and reducing the cost of your Holy Words by 100%.

spec.name: Holy
spec.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

spell.name: Light of the Naaru
spell.description: Serendipity reduces the remaining cooldown on the appropriate Holy Word by an additional 2 sec.

spec.name: Holy
spec.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

spell.name: Angelic Feather
spell.description: Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.  Maximum 3 charges.

spell.name: Afterlife
spell.description: Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 50%.

spec.name: Holy
spec.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

spell.name: Trail of Light
spell.description: When you cast Flash Heal, 40% of the healing is replicated to the previous target you healed with Flash Heal.

spec.name: Holy
spec.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

spec.name: Holy
spec.description: A versatile healer who can reverse damage on individuals or groups and even heal from beyond the grave.

spell.name: Shield Discipline
spell.description: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed you instantly regenerate 1% of your maximum mana.

spell.name: Purge the Wicked
spell.description: Cleanses the target with fire, causing 6,306 Fire damage and an additional 34,693 Fire damage over 20 sec. Spreads to an additional nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.

spec.name: Discipline
spec.description: Uses magic to shield allies from taking damage as well as heal their wounds.

spell.name: Shining Force
spell.description: Creates a burst of light around a friendly target, knocking away nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Angelic Feather
spell.description: Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.  Maximum 3 charges.

spell.name: Castigation
spell.description: Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.

spell.name: Power Infusion
spell.description: Infuses you with power for 20 sec, increasing haste by 25% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%.

spell.name: Halo
spell.description: Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 30 yd radius, healing allies for 17,261 and dealing 27,186 Holy damage to enemies.

spec.name: Discipline
spec.description: Uses magic to shield allies from taking damage as well as heal their wounds.

spell.name: Twist of Fate
spell.description: After healing a target below 35% health, you deal 20% increased damage and 20% increased healing for 10 sec.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

spell.name: Body and Soul
spell.description: Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.

spell.name: Mind Bomb
spell.description:
Inflicts the target with a Mind Bomb.



After 2 sec, or if the target dies, it unleashes a psychic explosion, stunning all enemies within 8 yds of the target for 4 sec.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

spell.name: Reaper of Souls
spell.description: Shadow Word: Death is now castable on targets below 35% health, and always generates Insanity as though it killed the target.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

spell.name: Auspicious Spirits
spell.description: Your Shadowy Apparitions now deal 100% increased damage and generate 3 Insanity.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

spell.name: Power Infusion
spell.description: Infuses you with power for 20 sec, increasing haste by 25% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.

spell.name: Surrender to Madness
spell.description:
All your Insanity-generating abilities generate 100% more Insanity, and you can cast while moving, until you exit Voidform.



Then you die. Horribly.

spec.name: Shadow
spec.description: Uses sinister Shadow magic, especially damage-over-time spells, to eradicate enemies.
